messages.subject: Unschooling Commune Discussion
messages.msgSnippet: A discussion is beginning at http://groups.yahoo.com/group/CTCom/ about an unschooling commune.  Even if you are not interested in participating in the
messages.messageBody:
A discussion is beginning at http://groups.yahoo.com/group/CTCom/ about an unschooling commune. Even if you are not interested in participating in the commune, perhaps you'd like to be in on the discussion. The group was formed yesterday.

Thank you!

Nichole

Yahoo! Groups Sponsor
ADVERTISEMENT
